title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting a marriage contract in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of concluding a marriage contract in a dream In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream of concluding a marriage contract in a dream, one of the dreams is very disturbing, so they are looking for an interpretation of this dream, but the reader must also suspend absolute disbelief because it is the jurisprudence of some scholars who seek to reach the truth, And he makes mistakes and can be harmed, in addition to the fact that the site and its managers have nothing. To do with the interpretations. Interpretation of a dream of cutting a marriage contract in a dream: Tearing a marriage contract in a dream may indicate instability that the dreamer may face in his life during this time. If one sees himself tearing up a marriage contract, this may indicate some problems and crises that the dreamer faces in His life in those days. In the event that a person sees that he has annulled the marriage contract, this may indicate some concerns that the dreamer was facing in his life at that time. A person’s dream that he is concluding a marriage contract may indicate changes in his life during this period and should Ban it. Interpretation of a dream about car parts in a dream: Anyone who sees car parts in a dream can indicate positive changes that occur in the dreamer’s life during this period. A person’s dream of car parts may indicate the good health that the dreamer enjoyed during that period. If he sees Oneself buys spare parts for a car, as this may indicate the end of the problems that the visionary was facing in his life during those days. It is possible that seeing car spare parts in a dream indicates recovery from a problem that the visionary may face in his life at that time, by God. I know. Interpretation of a dream about cutting bread in a dream: Cutting fresh bread in a dream may indicate the goodness that the dreamer is enjoying during this time. Whoever sees in his dream that he is cutting bread, perhaps it indicates his tenderness for others, thanks to God. If one sees that he is cutting bread and distributing it to others, he may The dream indicates the happy events that happen to the dreamer at that time. Whoever dreams of cutting bread may indicate good things that will come to the dreamer at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of cutting the neck of a finger in a dream: Cutting the tip of a child’s finger in a dream may indicate the sadness that the dreamer feels during This time. Anyone who sees in a dream that he is cutting off the brain of a child, may indicate his dissatisfaction with the things he is doing at that time. Anyone who sees in a dream that he is cutting off the stem of a finger may indicate some fears and sorrows that the dreamer faced in his life at that time. If a person sees himself cutting his finger in a dream, this may indicate some obstacles that the dreamer will face in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cutting pants in a dream: Seeing a man cutting his pants may indicate the pressure and tension that the dreamer feels during those days. Anyone can Dreaming that he cuts his pants may be a warning sign of bad things that may happen to the dreamer at that time. If a man sees in a dream that he cuts his pants, this may indicate some diseases that the dreamer is suffering from at that time. Whoever sees in his dream that he cuts his pants

title: Interpretation of an owl in a dream An owl in a dream of a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman

preview.html: We explain to you the dream of a white owl by seeing the appearance of an owl eating owl meat, eggs, and the feathers of a black and colored owl in its house, according to Ibn Sirin and the eagle, Imam al-Sadiq. The meaning of the album in the dream. The owl is a thief. It is very bad, and seeing it is a warning of an important or dangerous matter. An unexpected interpretation of the news album. Seeing owls in a dream means that you should avoid indulging in frivolous and harmful activities that may ruin your life or harm your interests. An owl in a woman’s dream generally indicates that she will need self- or positive energy to be able to face the dangers of daily life and focus on long-term goals and ambitions related to With emotion, family, work, or career. Hearing an owl in your dream reveals past pains and sorrows that may surface in your memory. The sound of an owl or owl in a dream may indicate that you are hearing disturbing news. The sound of an owl is disliked in visions, and it is said that it is a bad omen, even a bad omen. When you hear it in a dream, you have to prepare for something or an event in order to deal with it properly and avoid its psychological effects. Seeing a dead owl in a dream indicates something related to the loss of a loved one, and interpreters often consider it a sign of pain, sadness, or separation. The owl Which attacks you in a dream in reality warns you of something bad going around you. If owls attack you in your dream, know that there is someone who wants to offend you. You should look around you and look more specifically for your colleagues at work or work. The dream may indicate that there are fights or disagreements with your loved ones, friends or family. Hunting owls in a dream means that you are making mistakes or foolishness at work. Dreaming of an owl flying away from you indicates The end of your worries and the end of your problems and that a lot of goodness awaits you. Perhaps the dream ultimately expresses a desire in your mind that will soon come true. If you see in your dream that you have turned into an owl and you are one of those who tend to relax or have fun, know that you are a person who is in dire need of hard work and effort. And work because your desired goal is near. , but it can be lost if you do not try to achieve it. If you are one of those who suffer from exhaustion at work, then your vision invites you to take a breath and rest your body and mind because your goal has been achieved or is about to be achieved. Interpretation of the owl in a single girl’s dream: A bird that carries very positive meanings, If it is white in the dream, it is a symbol of sharp intelligence and the ability to plan practically for the future, because the owl bird is a skilled hunter par excellence. As for the unmarried woman who sees a white owl in her home, the dream portends a wealthy groom who will marry her. If the owl she saw in the dream is black, this indicates On a miserable or unsuitable groom. A colored album in a woman’s dream indicates false feelings around her from people who wish her more harm than good. A slaughtered owl bird in his dream can represent lost opportunities. A killed owl, and it is unfortunate in an unmarried girl’s dream to eat owl meat, This expresses a dangerous or painful conflict with someone she loves, or she may lose the trust of others around her. Interpretation of Al-Bo

title: Interpretation of a dream about my girlfriend: You agree with me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my friend who agrees with me in a dream. In the following lines, we will present the interpretation of a dream about my friend who agrees with me in a dream according to the interpretations of scholars and translators, not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about my friend: You agree with me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my friend: You agree with me in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this. However, seeing an enemy who makes me happy may mean that I am free from anxiety, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees someone trying to please him, it may be a sign of... Kindness and sustenance, and God knows the unseen. When you see someone who agrees with me in a dream, it may be a sign of happy events, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of my beloved reading the Qur’an in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of my beloved reciting the Qur’an in a dream can lead to marriage, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her lover While he is reading the Qur’an in a dream, this may portend good things, God willing. When you see someone you love reading the Qur’an in a dream, this may express kindness, and God knows the unseen, as it may indicate sustenance and avoiding committing sins and righteousness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream: My beloved, I was engaged to someone else in a dream. Interpretation My beloved dreamed that I was engaged to another person in a dream that could lead to the girl’s marriage approaching, and God knows the unseen. In the event that an unmarried girl sees her engagement to someone other than her lover, this may be evidence of getting rid of worry and grief, and God knows best. In the event that the dreamer sees his girlfriend engaged to someone else It may express kindness, and God knows the unseen. It may also indicate that pleasant things will happen, God willing. Interpretation of a dream of my beloved being sick in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of my beloved being sick in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing someone you love sick could be a sign of goodness, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees that someone he loves is sick, this may lead to the disappearance of sadness, God willing. If a married woman sees in a dream someone she loves sick, it may indicate That is for sustenance, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about my friend’s mother hating me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my friend’s mother hating me in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing my friend hating me in a dream could be a sign of hypocrisy and deception, and God knows all that is not seen. If an unmarried girl sees the death of her friend’s mother, it may be a sign of her friend’s poor psychological state, and God knows best. When You see the mother of your deceased friend, this may be an indication of crises, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of seeing my dead friend in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing my dead friend in a dream. Her desire to pray and seek forgiveness, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing a dead friend happy in a dream could mean kindness and abandonment of sins, and God has All knowledge: If a married woman sees a sad dead friend, this may indicate bad company, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When an unmarried girl sees her friend dead, this may indicate her need for help, and God knows all that is invisible. Interpretation of a dream about my friend loving someone else in a dream. title: Interpretation of the veil in a dream and its meaning in detail

preview.html: In this article, we will present to you the topic of interpreting the veil in a dream. It is known that the veil is an obligation from God Almighty on every Muslim woman, and there are many men and women who dream of the veil, and these dreams are confusing. To the hearts of its owners, especially if the woman dreams of taking off her veil, and through the lines we present to you in the following encyclopedia the most important interpretations of scholars about the dream of the veil and in different cases. Interpretation of the veil in a dream Ibn Sirin's interpretation of the dream of the veil Ibn Sirin sees that the veil in a dream is a sign of purity, chastity and concealment. A man's dream of the veil is a harbinger of good luck that will come to him. A girl's dream of taking off her veil in front of a stranger is a sign of her imminent marriage. Taking off the veil and then putting it back on symbolizes a change in circumstances for the better for the monarch. The veil in white indicates that the dreamer heard good news, and if it is engraved with gold, this indicates an abundance of sustenance for him. Whoever dreams of buying a white veil, his dream indicates his next visit or marriage. As for the black veil, it symbolizes purity, purity of heart and freedom from injustice. Al-Nabulsi's interpretation of seeing the veil in a dream Al-Nabulsi says that dreaming of a black veil is evidence that the dreamer is walking on the straight path, and it also indicates religiosity and purity of the soul. As for the white veil, it is a sign of success, joy and love, and if it is made of silk, this is a sign of abundance Money. Whoever sees in his dream that he is washing a white veil and spreading it, his dream indicates his purification from his sins, and that his upcoming life will be characterized by righteousness and hard work. Interpretation of seeing the veil in a dream by Ibn Shaheen From Ibn Shaheen's point of view, dreaming of a veiled girl in reality and without her veil in a dream indicates that this girl is doing a good deed that people do not realize, and it may also indicate the proximity of her marriage. Whoever sees a girl taking off her veil in front of a strange man, this means that she will marry that man. The dream of a girl taking off the veil and then wearing it again indicates that she is doing something related to her relationship that she needs to withdraw from. If the woman in the vision is a woman, the dream symbolizes that she is going through crises and difficulties, but she can overcome them and her life will remain stable. Interpretation of a single woman seeing the veil in a dream Whoever sees the veil in her dream, this is good news that her engagement date or marriage contract is imminent if she is engaged, especially if the veil is white. If a girl sees that she is wearing the veil, this means that there is joy on her way or that she will succeed in her work, this indicates the purity of her heart and the soundness of her faith. One of the most Promising visions A girl's dream of buying a veil. A dream about a girl taking off her veil indicates her negligence in worship because it is an alarm bell for her. Whoever dreams of giving up the veil for someone, her dream indicates that she will be suitable for guidance. Interpretation of a dream about the veil for a married woman Seeing the veil in a dream for a married woman is a sign of covering up her life and stability. If a married woman dreams of a black veil, her dream indicates that she enjoys satisfaction and psychological balance. Seeing a married woman wearing a light-colored veil indicates that the

A man’s dream of a hijab is considered a harbinger of good luck that will come to him. A girl’s dream of taking off her hijab in front of a stranger is a sign of her imminent marriage. A white hijab indicates that the dreamer heard good news, and if it is engraved With gold, this indicates abundant sustenance for him. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing the veil in a dream. Al-Nabulsi says that dreaming of a black veil is evidence that The dreamer is walking on the straight path, and it also indicates religiosity and purity of the soul. As for the white veil, it is a sign of success, joy, and love, and if it is made of silk, then this is a sign of abundance of money. Whoever sees in his dream that he is washing a white veil and spreading it, then his dream indicates that he is cleansed of his sins, And that his next life will be characterized by righteousness and hard work. Interpretation of seeing the veil in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. From Ibn Shaheen’s point of view, dreaming of a veiled girl in reality and without her veil in the dream indicates that this girl is doing a good deed that people do not realize, and it may also indicate the imminence of her marriage. Whoever sees a girl taking off her hijab in front of a strange man, this means that she will marry that man. A dream about a girl taking off her hijab and then wearing it again indicates that she is doing something related to her relationship that she needs to withdraw from. If the woman in the vision is a woman, then the dream symbolizes that she is going through crises and difficulties. But she can overcome it and her life will remain stable. Interpretation of a single woman seeing the hijab in a dream. Whoever sees the hijab in her dream, this is good news that the date of her engagement or marriage contract is imminent if she is engaged, especially if the hijab is white. If the girl sees that she is wearing the hijab, this means that there is She is happy on her way or that she will succeed in her work, as this indicates the purity of her heart and the soundness of her faith. One of the most promising visions is a girl’s dream of buying a hijab. A dream about a girl taking off her hijab indicates her negligence in worship because it serves as a warning bell for her. Whoever dreams of giving up the hijab for someone, her dream It indicates that she will be suitable for guidance. Interpretation of a dream about a veil for a married woman: Seeing a veil in a dream for a married woman is a sign of covering up her life and stability. If a married woman dreams of a black veil, then her dream indicates that she enjoys contentment and psychological balance. Seeing a married woman wearing a light-colored veil indicates Until the end

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about cleaning teeth in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of brushing teeth in a dream by senior scholars: The vision of brushing teeth and cleaning them of dirt is considered one of the important visions that Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq talked about. We decided on the specialized Egyptian website to display all these explanations, and follow the following paragraphs. That you can learn more about this vision and its interpretations for all dreamers in their different social and material situations. Interpretation of a dream about brushing teeth in a dream Brushing teeth in a dream is one of the visions that interpreters worked hard to interpret, as the materials used in cleaning, such as the brush and toothpaste, were not Available in the past, teeth were cleaned only using toothpicks. Therefore, the dream will be interpreted according to the updates developed by interpreters, taking into account that the original interpretations that represent the cornerstone of this vision were developed by great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, and all these details you will know. In the following interpretations: If the dreamer uses toothpaste during his sleep to clean his teeth from food residue and their color becomes bright white, this is a sign of his exhaustion and the great effort that he will make to achieve his goals soon. The dream also carries another sign, which is the dreamer’s strength and his great attachment to his ambition and his ability to bear the effort, no matter how difficult it is. And heavy, but he will be happy in the end because God is (high). b) He reassured all the hardworking people in the world, and it was stated in the following Qur’an: “Thus every hardworking person in this world will certainly obtain a large share of success and excellence. Some interpreters have said that the degree of whiteness of the teeth after brushing them in a dream has many interpretations. But If the degree of whiteness is somewhat dim, this is a sign that he will wait some time to enjoy his success in this world. If the dreamer used a brush to brush his teeth in the dream and felt very tired while brushing his teeth with it, but in the end he obtained the desired result and his teeth became white and beautiful. The dream expresses the obstacles and challenges that he will face. You will find him in his future life, and there is no doubt that these difficulties will be of one of the following types: The first type: Perhaps these challenges are the lack of material resources at his disposal, and therefore he will not be able to achieve his dreams and ambitions unless he is able to provide the funds necessary to complete the path to reach his goal. The desired. The second type: The dreamer may suffer from illnesses that make him stop achieving his ambitions for a while, and after his recovery he continues to strive for success. The third type: The dreamer may face many opponents stronger than him and this will be the reason for his delay in reaching his goal because they have many possibilities that It made him reach the goal before the dreamer, but in the end God will help him and make it happen. Taste the taste of success and give him the ability to achieve his goal. If the dreamer wants to brush and clean his teeth, the dream shows three signs: First: Especially for employees who aspire to reach a position higher than their current position.

If the dreamer wants to brush and clean his teeth, the dream shows three signs: First: Especially for employees who aspire to reach a position higher than their current position.

title: Interpretation of seeing bed bugs in a dream for married and single women

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing bed bugs in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream many bugs and smooth ones, this indicates a large amount of money and spoils that the dreamer will gain. Interpreters interpreted seeing bed bugs in a dream as an indication of a weak and humiliated man. Whoever sees that in a dream, mistakes enter into a cycle, and this suggests that The dreamer is a weak person, and the good oath will find him. Bed bugs in a dream indicate many fears and sadness that the dreamer suffers from. Whoever sees that in a dream, bugs contain it, and this indicates the presence of evil people and may indicate the possession or sadness of the dreamer who will succeed him. Interpretation of seeing bugs Ibn Shaheen Al-Zahiri explained Ibn Shaheen’s explanation: Seeing bugs in a dream indicates a weak person with a bad smell. He dreams that he is next to an insect, this indicates his closeness to a weak person. Who knows that insects enter his mouth or inside his ear, this is a good sign for him. And who knows that? Overcome stink bugs, this is a sign of victory over He is weak and his enemy and works to spread his news to people. Whoever sees a large number of bugs and walking on them indicates enemies and rulers or someone who is worried about him. And whoever sees bedbug bites in a dream, this indicates that it took a lot of water. Miller’s interpretation of seeing bedbugs in a dream is an explanation of Miller seeing bedbugs in a dream. This indicates a long and continuous illness and may indicate many sorrows and worries that the dreamer faces. Whoever sees a large bedbug in a dream, this indicates his bad luck and that he is unlucky. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin: Dreaming of seeing bedbugs in a dream. Ibn Sirin’s explanation of seeing a bedbug in a dream indicates This refers to weak enemies surrounding the dreamer who cannot defeat or harm him. Seeing bedbugs in a dream may indicate treacherous soldiers or soldiers who have no loyalty. Bedbugs in a dream indicate the distress and sadness that befalls the dreamer. Whoever sees a single bedbug in a dream, this indicates The person who is often slandered and talked about by people, and he is the person about whom gossip is spread and who is considered a weak person. And whoever sees the defect entering the cavity, this is the dreamer’s dispute with a weak man, and his gain is good, but it is temporary and does not last. Therefore, we have presented to you All possible interpretations of seeing bed bugs in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we take your comments at the end of the article and we will give you the interpretation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing colors in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of colors in dreams: seeing the meaning of colors, and we will present the meaning of seeing all of these colors in detail, because colors in dreams are evidence of many events that the dreamer is going through, and we know that there are many interpretations of colors, and they differ in light of the fact that the fortuneteller is male and female, and through this article we try Explaining the most important interpretations of this according to the opinions of the leading interpreters of the dream. Light colors indicate good luck and good news, and the coloring of an unmarried girl indicates her marriage to a young man with whom she will be happy. Interpretation of a dream about colors by Ibn Sirin Seeing the color white in a dream means purity of intentions and purity. Colorful represents Al-Fatihah in Dreaming of happy life and spaciousness of life. A black dream indicates sadness and mystery in the dreamer’s life. See also: The meaning of green in a dream. Explanations for displaying different colors. Scientists have indicated that pink in a dream is a sign of romance, love, and passion in the dreamer’s life, and pink is a combination of red and white. If the person who is dreaming does not like the color pink, then seeing it in a dream means sadness and weak character. As for seeing the color yellow among the unpleasant visions in the dream, it is a sign of fear, severe anxiety, and betrayal. As for the positive meaning of seeing the color yellow, it is a sign of happiness, vitality, and positive thinking. In the dreamer's life. Green It indicates the dreamer's health. Coffee It means money. See also: Interpretation of the color black in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Interpretation of a dream about colors for individuals A girl's dream of orange colors shows a positive change in her life. If she is found wearing orange clothes, this means that her financial situation has improved Regarding the girl who sees orange hair, this usually indicates success and superiority in her life. Orange shoes are a sign of engagement or marriage. Interpretation of a dream about colors for a married woman. Seeing the color of a married woman’s skin turn red indicates that she is suffering from many problems. The white color indicator is in the strength that The woman acquired it in her work. The color indicator is blue in the positive event that she is experiencing. Seeing the color blue is a sign of psychological calm. Also, seeing the color green indicates marital happiness and extreme joy. See also: The meaning of the color white in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about colors for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream wearing clothes Brown means that childbirth will be easy and free of severe pain. In general, light colors in dreams represent peace of mind. Interpretation of a dream about colors in a dream Seeing light colors indicates happiness, joy, and pleasure. White color indicates purity, peace, and happy occasions. Pink color indicates feelings of love And romance. The yellow color shows fear and anxiety and shows betrayal and illness. Seeing the color orange indicates positive changes in the dreamer. Seeing an unmarried woman wearing an orange dress indicates positive changes in her life. Seeing the color green on a married woman indicates happiness and stability in her life.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a brush in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a brush in a dream. A person always cleans his body and maintains its cleanliness and beautiful smell. He uses different means to clean it. Therefore, he cleans his teeth and mouth with a toothbrush, which has close bristles tied together. He cleans the teeth and food residues stuck to the teeth in order to prevent tooth decay. Diseases There are two types: manual brush and electric brush, so what is the interpretation of a dream about seeing a brush in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a toothbrush in a dream: Seeing a toothbrush in a dream shows the position that the person will occupy or will reach in the dream. Life, in addition to an indication of the success that a person will achieve in life, and here are the interpretations that indicate this vision: An unmarried girl is responsible and maintains morals and customs when she sees a toothbrush in her dream. Likewise, a married woman lives in stability and happiness with her husband when she dreams of a toothbrush In addition, pregnancy and childbirth are easy for the pregnant woman without problems when she sees a toothbrush in her sleep. In addition, a person will be blessed abundantly in his life if he sees a new toothbrush in his dream and its color is white. He also commits many sins when he sees a toothbrush Dirty in his sleep. Likewise, an unmarried young man comes out of the stress and anxiety he was experiencing when he sees a toothbrush in his dream. Moreover, a person’s life changes for the better and better when he dreams that he is brushing his teeth. See also: Interpretation of a dream about pajamas in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream A bath brush in a dream: This vision shows that a person can get rid of the worries and problems that accompanied him in his life and indicates that the owner of this dream will hear happy and joyful news in his life: The unmarried young man fears his future and the unknown within him when he sees the bath brush in his dream. Likewise, a man should Improving his appearance if he dreams of a toilet brush. Also, positive and joyful changes occur in the life of an unmarried girl when she sees a toilet brush in her dream. In addition, a person moves from one place to another where he lives, when he sees a toilet brush in his dream. In addition, A person falls into fears and problems when he sees a dirty brush during his sleep. The patient is also cured of his illness when he sees the brush in his sleep. In addition, a person’s spirit improves when he sees a clean brush in his dream. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pregnant cat or kittens in a dreamDream Cleaning a hairbrush in a dream: Seeing a brush is one of the things worthy of praise in a dream, and how if cleaning it is a sign of removing worry and fatigue from the dreamer’s life, and we will tell you the interpretations related to this vision: A person hears happy and joyful news when he sees in his dream a hairbrush that is clean and not dirty. Likewise, he will be blessed A person is blessed with many good things and becomes wealthy when he sees a hairbrush in his dream. He also faces difficulties and problems in his life

title: Interpretation of seeing pears in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing pears in a dream According to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, pears are considered one of the fruits that combine the pleasure of taste and benefit because they contain many important and necessary nutritional elements for the body. Whether it is ripe or not, its color and smell, and whether the fortuneteller ate it or not, so in this article today we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing pears in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of the dream of seeing pears in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing pears in a dream is a sign of goodness, grace, and abundance of sustenance for the one who has the vision. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing pears in a dream in their time, as this is good and happy and joyful news will reach the pioneer. In the interpretation of a vision Pears in an unusual way, Ibn Sirin says about them that they portend sadness, anxiety, stress and tension. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a fresh green pear in a dream and the dreamer was looking for a job, then this is a sign that he will find a new job opportunity with a large salary and position. But he says that whoever sees that he is eating Unfresh pears or spoiled pears, this indicates that he is exposed to pressure, problems, and anxiety. As for whoever sees himself eating pears out of season, this indicates that he is gaining money through illegal means and that this money is not his right. Ibn Sirin pointed out that seeing pears in green and red in color... A dream is a dream worthy of praise, because it indicates goodness and blessing. As for the one who saw yellow pears, Ibn Sirin says: He may have been suffering from some disease in the period that followed his vision. Interpretation of the dream of seeing pears in a dream Al-Nabulsi’s Interpretation Al-Nabulsi says that it is good to see pears in a dream. Al-Nabulsi interpreted seeing pears in a dream outside the season as a sign of illness, and God knows best, but a person will be cured of this illness by God. He also suggested that seeing green pears in a dream is a sign of the arrival of a person who has been absent for a long time. It is believed that pears are a fruit that is often considered Her eyesight is good. Interpretation of a dream about seeing pears in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees in her dream that it bears fruit, this portends her pregnancy and that her fetus will be a boy, God willing. If a married woman sees pears in her dream, this means that she carries many good qualities and that she maintains her home and helps Her home should look its best. But if a married woman sees that she is eating pears in a dream, this means that she was facing some problems, but they will disappear as quickly as possible, whatever those problems may be. But if a married woman sees in a dream that she is cutting a pear, This indicates that she wants to raise her children well. Whoever sees a pear in her dream while in reality she is suffering from fatigue and illness, this portends her recovery. As for seeing large pears, it is considered a praiseworthy dream, as it foretells that you will receive a lot of money, whether it is an increase in salary or an inheritance. Interpretation of a dream about seeing pears in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees pear fruits and carries them, this portends the arrival of a male child. As indicated,
